subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The United States advanced to the quarterfinals of the Concacaf Gold Cup with a 1-0 victory over Guadeloupe on Tuesday night in Kansas City, Kan. The team will next play Jamaica in Washington on Sunday.
snippet: The United States advanced to the quarterfinals of the Concacaf Gold Cup with a 1-0 victory over Guadeloupe on Tuesday night in Kansas City, Kan. The team will next play Jamaica in Washington on Sunday.
